DocText:
1. Add PDF files
   Click "Add PDF(s)" to select one or more PDF files.

2. Arrange order
   Use "Move Up" and "Move Down" to reorder.

3. Remove or clear
   "Remove" deletes selected files.
   "Clear List" empties the list.

4. Merge
   Click "Merge" and choose an output name.

âš  Known issue:
If you use an existing file from the list as output, it will be empty and corrupted.
